Branded restaurant ordering app

for restaurant owners starting from $29/month
Get instant access to your own mobile app for free!

Customized menu

Upload your menu items with rich descriptions, pricing ang imagery

Reservation & Delivery

Select menu items for online ordering and design your personalized table booking scheme

Loyalty program

Grant bonus or cashback for both online and offline ordering

CRM marketing

Use PUSH notifications to conduct your latest updates

App Builder for restaurant owners

Create your own brand Restaurant Booking App to increase traffic Built-in Restaurant Food Delivery Platform with online ordering Restaurant loyalty app functionality with customized bonus programs Activate the restaurant table booking app feature and impove CX Waiter app included to manage loyalty program with no need in extra devices Takeaway ordering app functions

Restaurant Loyalty App features

  1. Encourage visitors to install the app, promote it online and grow your customer database

  2. Design your custom loyalty program

  3. Get the admin CRM access to manage users and bonuses. Set the privileges for administrative personnel

  4. Let your guests to collect or to spend their bonuses via simple QR-scanning procedure using the Waiter app (compatible with any iOS/Android device)

  5. Fine-tune your restaurant loyalty app functionality: give a gift, set up the dynamic discount depending on the bill sum and menu items ordered.

    6. Download Waiter App guidelines

Custom table reservation functionality

Provide a 24/7 automated marketing platform for your cafe

Keep in touch with loyal customers

Use a user-friendly web interface to manage menu, discount policy and loyalty programs

Improve your Customer Experience with faster service

About Quick Meals

Quick Meals. A new and rich option in prepared foods to come to Laredo freshness service and quality!

According to AppCafe stats, this place is one of the most popular Restaurants in the region. We graded Quick Meals with the rating of 2.5 absed on the open statistics, reviews and feedback from visitors.
